title: Mcu641
author: Mcu641
content: Hi,I am always ready to buy any cryptocurrency (that has value)I can pay you with SEPA instant transfer, PayPal, Skrill or Neteller and other popular ways.My fees are 1% of current market value.My telegram: @Crypto1981 or you can write me here personal message.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Mcu641 on June 21, 2023, 04:19:21 PMI can pay you with SEPA instant transfer, PayPal, Skrill or Neteller and other popular ways.Some of these services are reversible where you can cancel or reverse the transaction and claim that you transferred the amount by mistake while the transactions in Bitcoin are final. It will be difficult for you to find many people eager to buy from you, but the opposite can happen if you want to sell bitcoins for any service.If you can add non-reversible payment options, you will find better interest.
